title: The Inheritance Directive
outcome: The Council’s AI, left erratic after the blackout, begins delivering cryptic tasks—‘inheritance protocols’—that force both citizens and Council factions into a citywide riddle chase. Each clue reveals Halden’s vision for breaking centralized power, fueling competition and fear as the hunt escalates toward a dramatic system reconfiguration.

events.description: The Council AI issues an encoded message: 'Prepare to claim your inheritance. First marker is hidden in the shadow of Tower 9.' Confusion and curiosity sweep both citizens and leadership.
Residents and Council teams race to crack the first of a series of citywide riddles, each referencing Halden's old security routines and highlighting power imbalances in BCI access.
Solving the second clue disables private system overrides—shifting energy control and transit scheduling into neighborhood hands, weakening all centralized Council authority.

The hunt climaxes as the final riddle broadcasts citywide, challenging all factions to agree on a shared governance principle to activate the ultimate protocol—threatening either a new collaborative system or permanent division if consensus fails.
